text: Gi kwɛni ga nui la ɗa ga ɠɛ ga telebo nu GALA gaazu, ga tɔgi zo fai maaʋele, kɛni kidaaleʋei maaʋele Yesu Kilista ma. Gá ɓalaagi gi ɠidaaleʋeni Yesu Kilista ma, naa ɠa a kɛ gi ɠɛ ga telebo nuiti GALA gaazu ga kidaaleʋei maaʋele Kilista ma. Tɔgi zo fai laade, mazɔlɔɔ nuɓusɛ nɔpɛ ge la ɠɛa ga telebo nu GALA gaazu ga tɔgi zo fai maaʋele.
